channel.title: Comments on: TextAlive technology brings lyrics to life at Magical Mirai!
channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: By: Dorellymimi
item.dc:creator: Dorellymimi
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/textalive-technology-brings-lyrics-to-life-at-magical-mirai/#comment-68">mokona madoki</a>.
Didn't try it myself, but it should be possible!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to mokona madoki.

Didn’t try it myself, but it should be possible!

item.title: By: mokona madoki
item.dc:creator: mokona madoki
item.description: So does this mean that you can uploaf your own song to make a lyric video for, or does textalive only use songs they select????
item.content:encoded: So does this mean that you can uploaf your own song to make a lyric video for, or does textalive only use songs they select????
